UBER PARTNERS COMPANY!

WE INVITE DRIVERS! WITH YOUR OWN CAR!

Uber is a rapidly growing company. The company is a leader among taxi companies in the market and is completely transparent, allowing you to control all processes in your personal account. There is a bonus system. In addition to completed work on orders, the company awards bonuses for peak times.

We are one of the partners and have proven to be one of the best teams in Kiev. Our drivers earn from 80000 to 120000 per month.
advantages

8 reasons to start working with us

No cash, payment is made automatically
The cost of the trip is paid by the passenger with a linked bank card, that is, there are no risks associated with carrying cash for both the passenger and the driver, and you don't need to look for small change for exchange.
8% commission + BONUSES
We have a minimum commission and we pay bonuses for each trip, while some of our competitors keep the bonuses for themselves. We work honestly and drivers earn more with us!
High income with guaranteed payments
We pay salaries to the driver's personal bank card! You don't need to register an LLC, individual entrepreneur, pay taxes, file a declaration, pay accounting services, and maintain a bank account.
Work at your own convenient time, no schedules
You simply click the button to go online to start working, and when you decide to finish, click to go offline. You can work only in the morning, evening, on weekends or holidays!
Comfortable, transparent and simple connection
We connect you remotely and for free, you don't need to come to us! You send us copies of your documents, we register you and send you the connection details, and in 1-2 days you can start working!
Always a large number of orders
The app shows where there are currently more orders and where the rates are higher. You won't have any downtime or empty runs. Our passengers are always pleasant and absolutely non-conflict people, who are pleasant to ride with.
Round-the-clock support
Uber provides round-the-clock driver support via email. If something is unclear, you can always ask a question via online consultation.
No chess and stickers
You don't need to change the color, install "chess" on the car, or cover it with stickers.

Uber mobile application

CONDITIONS: with your own car:
  • Connect to the UBER system for 10%.
  • No contributions, 0%!
  • We can connect remotely without visiting the office.
  • No need for individual entrepreneur status.
  • Orders are distributed regardless of the driver's rating.
  • Payment only by non-cash settlement.
  • Money is transferred to the driver's card or in cash at the office.
Earn 7000-12000 rubles per day + bonus 3000t
CONDITIONS: using a company car:
  • We provide a car without a deposit.
  • No daily rental payments.
  • Wednesday, Friday, and Saturday work for the company, the rest of the days you work for yourself.
REQUIREMENTS:
  • The car must not have any advertising.
  • The car should not be yellow and should not have yellow license plates.
  • We can connect remotely without visiting the office.
  • The car must not be older than 3 years.
  • Driving experience of at least 3 years.
  • Device with Android 4.0 and higher (Samsung).
DOCUMENTS:
  • Driver's license (both sides).
  • Passport (front page).
  • Vehicle registration certificate.
  • License (if available).
  • Phone number.
  • Card number for transferring money (indicate in the letter)!
